Jelly Invoice V1

Invoicing webapp for ghetto freelancers

A flexible solution for producing invoices and keeping them neatly organized on your local or shared drive.

Extending Jekyllâ€™s ability to easily create static web pages (blogs) with its many blog-aware features, Jelly has been adapted to output invoices in place of blogs. Jelly calculates for you, hourly or fixed pricing, with or without tax needs.

Check out Jelly Invoicing version 1.0 to download the code, or simply check out the Demo.
